title: Beyond Narrative Self

panel_structure.description: The Architect on a yellow brick road that begins to dissolve and fragment, each stone revealing raw emotional colors and pre-verbal symbols beneath the neat narrative path
Close-up of consciousness fragments floating free from the dissolved path—raw emotions as literal flames, wordless knowledge as geometric forms, experiences too primal for sentences

transformation_notes: The yellow brick road becomes a metaphor for our narrative path through life—altered states reveal what lies beneath this constructed journey: raw, burning emotions and knowledge that predates words.
